translations: n.逃脱，躲避；逃避手段，逃避方法；遁词，借口

sentences.sentence: We want straight answers. No evasions.
sentences.translation: 我们要直接的答复。不要绕弯。

sentences.sentence: His speech was full of evasions and half-truths.
sentences.translation: 他的发言全是些遁词和真真假假的陈述。

sentences.sentence: Such evasions are less than convincing.
sentences.translation: 诸如此类的借口毫无说服力。
